welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hanam, Korea! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's blend of traditional culture and modern attractions. Explore our charming streets, delicious cuisine, and vibrant markets, and make unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.name: 서부한우생고기전문
restaurants.description: 서부한우생고기전문 is a korean bbq restaurant located in 하남시.

restaurants.name: 착한낙지
restaurants.description: 착한낙지 is a korean restaurant located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: 아초원
restaurants.description: 아초원 is a vietnamese restaurant located in 하남시.

restaurants.name: 오발탄
restaurants.description: 오발탄 is a korean restaurant located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: McDonld's (맥도날드)
restaurants.description: McDonld's (맥도날드) is a fast food restaurant located in 서울특별시.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Seoul AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suwon Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Suwon Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimpo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Gimpo Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'GMP Free WiFi' and following the prompts.
